publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4048 Tricia Marwick: 70th Anniversary of the Rotary Club of Levenâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Rotary Club of Leven on its 70th anniversary; notes that since 1939 the organisation has worked tirelessly for the benefit of the local community and to raise funds for a number of worthwhile causes, and wishes the Rotary Club of Leven a long and prosperous future. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-4048 70th Anniversary of the Rotary Club of Leven (lodged on 1 May 2009) Rob Gibson*, John Park*, John Lamont*, Brian Adam*, Jamie McGrigor*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*
S3M-4048 70th Anniversary of the Rotary Club of Leven (lodged on 1 May 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-4048 70th Anniversary of the Rotary Club of Leven (lodged on 1 May 2009) Michael Matheson*
S3M-4048 70th Anniversary of the Rotary Club of Leven (lodged on 1 May 2009) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-4048 70th Anniversary of the Rotary Club of Leven (lodged on 1 May 2009) Angela Constance*
